name: Strength of the Land
author: Levi
desc:
The energy of the earth beneath your feet flows through you and stabilizes you. For the duration, as long as you are on the ground, you are proficient in all Strength rolls and you have advantage on any saving throw against an effect that would forcibly move you or knock you prone.

If you have the Earth tag, this spell does not require concentration.

If you have the Water tag, you incorporate some fluidity to your stubbornness, and can choose to automatically succeed on saving throws against effects that would forcibly move you or knock you prone.
